text: @realDonaldTrump Yeah, you’re doing really GREAT! Really BIGLY.  And I’m sure the loved ones of the almost 100,000 people who have tragically passed away due to a combination of Covid-19 and your staggering ineptitude, agree too. How was your round of golf today!? Great!? https://t.co/nRGjzBQQlA
